Title: WPF Spark
Description:
WPFSpark is a library of user controls which can be used to provide a rich User Experience to applications.

The WPFSpark Blog
http://wpfspark.wordpress.com
HomeWiki:
WPFSpark v1.2 is now released.

The codebase has been shifted to GitHub. You can access it here.

WPFSpark is a library of user controls which can be used by developers to provide a rich User Experience in their applications.

What's new in WPFSpark v1.2?

  • ToggleSwitch has been rewritten from scratch to remove previous bugs and provide robust new features.
  • FluidWrapPanel has been revamped to support child items of different sizes.
  • A new and improved SparkWindow with the look and feel of Windows 10 desktop window.
  • Bug fixes and improvements in other controls.

Check out this CodeProject article describing in detail about the new features in WPFSpark v1.2.
